suggestedNewContent.title: Common Container Pitfalls
suggestedNewContent.contentOutline: Cover: 1) Cannot use both color and decoration (put color inside BoxDecoration), 2) Container expands to fill parent when no child or size, 3) borderRadius ignored with BoxShape.circle, 4) decoration doesn't clip children (need ClipRRect)

suggestedNewContent.title: Circular Containers
suggestedNewContent.contentOutline: Show how to create circular containers using BoxShape.circle, explain that borderRadius must be null when using circle shape, show avatar/profile picture use case

suggestedNewContent.title: Gradient Backgrounds
suggestedNewContent.contentOutline: Cover LinearGradient and RadialGradient usage in BoxDecoration, show begin/end alignment options, provide colorful button example

suggestedNewContent.title: When to Use Container vs Alternatives
suggestedNewContent.contentOutline: Explain that Container combines Padding + DecoratedBox + ConstrainedBox + Align. Recommend using SizedBox for empty spacing, Padding for padding-only, DecoratedBox for decoration-only. Container is best when combining multiple properties.

suggestedNewContent.title: Profile Card with Image
suggestedNewContent.contentOutline: Real-world example showing Container with DecorationImage background, circular avatar, and card-like layout combining multiple Container concepts
